question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term refers to adventure stories with a search motif?
description: The image is a DVD cover for "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring." The cover features a collage of characters from the movie, including a prominent figure in the center wearing a cloak and holding a staff. The background includes various other characters and scenes from the film. The text on the cover indicates that the movie was nominated for multiple awards, including Best Picture and Best Direction.
